reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan well-made with lovely thick soft fabric, and appreciate its perfect weight for year-round wear, particularly in hot weather.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: Fit is true to size, I like my sweaters a little bigger for comfortable fit so I got the XL and it was perfect. Very soft material as well Read more
items.author: rooster1975

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely and Classy
items.body: This cardigan is perfect! Perfect length, perfect thickness, perfect style. It is lovely and will keep you warm. It is stylish has two pockets and the detailing around the neck an hem makes it looks very classy. I'm indeed loving it! Read more
items.author: Raindrops

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wish it came in xsmall
items.body: Fit- I am 5'5", 100lbs, and I ordered the small. It fits pretty well, but there is definitely some room for other sizes, unless you're a good bit taller. The sleeves just come to my wrists, and they ride up quite a bit if I move my arms, so if you are very tall or have extra long arms, the sleeves may be too short. I wish they had xsmall though, as long as the sleeves didn't get even shorter. Material- The material is very soft and not stiff, even with the ribbing details. It's definitely more of a lightweight material, but I'd say closer to the heavier end of lightweight, almost medium. It seems like a decent material, but I am a bit concerned about how well it will hold up over time. Some reviews mentioned the seams coming apart, and while all my seams are fine now, I can see how they could wear since some of the seams aren't super tight but looser, more open weave. Care- The instructions say to hand wash, but I know my clothes will sit in the dirty clothes basket forever if I have to hand wash, so I always just take my chances and wash them in the machine. I washed this cardigan in cold water on the delicate cycle and laid flat to dry before wearing. Only one wash so far, but it did fine. Color- I ordered the green, and it was as I expected when it arrived. A bright green, but not grass or primary green, more jewel tone/emerald. Overall- It's a nice, soft cardigan with a decent fit. If it was a bit slimmer fit or came in xsmall and/or had longer sleeves, it would probably be 5 stars for me. I like the style and color variety available, but I will likely not purchase this again in another color. We'll see how it holds up over time and how I feel about the fit once I wear it more. Read more
items.author: ANM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to Size
items.body: I first bought a Large because I read comments saying to size up. Turned out it was too wide for me so I ended up getting my normal size Medium and it fits better to my liking. In my opinion after washing and everything it is true to size. I like the color and how it fits me now. Read more
items.author: Melanie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice cardigan for the nice price.
items.body: It's a nice lightweight cardigan. I ordered a large because it does run small. I recomment going up 1 size than your normal size. Read more
items.author: LISA MICHELLE KING

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but needs sewn better
items.body: Super cute and comfortable but the collar seam came undone and had to be sewn back up after just wear for a few hours . Read more
items.author: Anthony Lynn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice
items.body: Very nice sweater, order 1 size larger. 5' 1" 130 lbs ordered a medium and it fits well. Read more
items.author: mary ann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Comfy.
items.body: Fit nice and size i a perfect fit. Read more
items.author: monica37

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 2-navy Blue, 9-2-light Blue, Hollow-white, 5-beige, 8-burgundy, Hollow-apricot, Hollow-camel Heather, Black, 9-1-light Purple, 7-washed Olive, 5-1-light Grey, 7-light Pink, Hollow-navy Blue, 6-heather Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
